title: What do you think of K and Seon from I-land? I'm getting weird vibes from both of them. - Quora

response.answer_text: As someone who’s watched up to like 40-something minutes of the third episode, I think I’m qualified enough to answer this? However, once I finish it I’ll edit this answer and let you know if I’ve changed my stance or not. Anyways, as for answering the question, I don’t get any weird vibes from them. At one point I got weird vibes from Jay and Hyesung but yeah. I think K is pretty nice and actually understands the teamwork concept. I think Seon is kind of exclusive to some of the contestants but not because he’s trying to be mean or doesn’t like them but I think he just has some people he prefers to stick with.
